Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Sparks fly as the two blades clash...'}
{3: "But this time, Lucia's blade becomes redirected and whirls into the air..."}
{1: '1', 3: "The enemy easily catches Lucia's blade in the air..."}
{3: 'Then nails Lucia onto the wall, restraining her movements.'}
{3: 'But the more she struggles, the more Construct vital fluids seep out from her pinned arm.'}
{2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'Your pain receptions are cut off...? How pitiable...'}
{2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'But your sorrow will end here... Lucia.'}
{3: 'She casually parries the bullet and deflects it deep into the ruins. It stirs up a cloud of dust.'}
{3: 'Up until now, she only had eyes for Lucia, but now her gaze slowly travels toward you.'}
{2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: "Commandant... You're still a part of this farce..."}
{2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'Are you prepared to die for her?'}
{3: "Lee's suppressive fire does nothing to slow the enemy."}
{1: '1', 3: 'In just a flash, she is already standing right before your eyes.'}
{3: "But the enemy's blade easily pierces through your arm, in the same position as Lucia's wound."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'So, "Commandant", do you really think you can stand in her shoes and understand her?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I... don't know what sort of answer you're looking for...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But I'll always entrust Commandant with my life.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'Is that so... I see.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'That only means... the tragedy will go on.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: 'I... look forward to your choice after learning about the truth...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct α', 3: '...Well then, open your eyes and see the humans for who they really are through your precious "Commandant".', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Having said that, the mysterious enemy sheaths her weapon as if losing all interest...'}
{3: 'Then turns and walks back into the blinding sunlight.'}
{3: 'She gazes at you meaningfully before completing vanishing into the light.'}
